evidence_span: All three systems utilize a back-pressure regulator to control the ytem pressure and a high-pressure pulsating pump  crculat te water/seam.Chromel alumel (K-type) thermocouples were used to measure the test temperature. At least two and as many as four thermocouples were used to assure temperature uniformity within the test zone. The test temperature within the test zone in all three systems were controlled within $\pm 2 . 2 ^ { \circ } \mathrm { C }$ at 480 to $5 3 0 ^ { \circ } \mathbf { C }$ .
